name: Livon
startIntroPart1: Defend your people with undying fervor, o great Queen Rein of Livon. When your subjects are in danger, put your martial prowess to use, and strile down the enemy, even if it shackles your nation's treasury. Remind your people that they are above simple barbarians during peacetime, and build. build in such ways that will convey Livonian cultural dominance over all the world.
startIntroPart2: With the past behind you, both its good and its bad, can you once again lead your people? Defend them through a shield of one thousand thorns? Can you build a civilization to stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You are a threat to my people, so you must be destroyed!
attacked: You dare threaten me and my people?! You'll soon regret underestimating us.
defeated: Augh, Defeat. So this is what Father meant... Very well, please treat my people with respect...
introduction: Greetings, foreigner. I am Queen Rein of Livon. Beside me is one of my retainers, Robbie. We are pleased to make your aquaintance.
hateLetsHearIt: I have no time for your insolence!
My bodyguard is running out of patience for you.
hateNo: You dare suggest such an unfair trade?
afterPeace: My people are now safe, that is all that matters.
tradeRequest: We extend this generous trade offer to you.
uniques: [+20]% Strength for units fighting in [Friendly Land] <when at war>
[+20]% Production when constructing [Culture] buildings [in all cities] <when not at war>
